discussion.p: The 10,000th value returned by ranlux48 is supposed to be 249142670248501. We get 88229545517833. (Note that this depends on ranlux48_base.)

blockquote.blockquote: Required behavior: The 10000th consecutive invocation of a default-constructed object of type ranlux48 shall produce the value 249142670248501 88229545517833.
